name: jquery-plugincreator
description: A jQuery add-on that makes creating plugins a little easier.

scripts.test: babel src --presets es2015 --plugins transform-es2015-modules-umd --out-dir dist; babel test/*.es6 --presets es2015 --plugins transform-es2015-modules-umd --out-dir dist; x-www-browser test/tests.html

author: Adam Jorgensen <adam.jorgensen.za@gmail.com>
